title: Asia Album: A fine balance of culture and fashion: Pakistani craftsmen make traditional shoes "chappal"
content:
Craftsmen make traditional shoes locally called "chappal" at a shop in northwest Pakistan's Peshawar on Sept. 19, 2020.
PESHAWAR, Pakistan, Sept. 20 (Xinhua) -- Craftsmen are making traditional shoes which are locally called "chappal" at a shop in northwest Pakistan's Peshawar. People in northwest region of Pakistan wear "chappal" on important occasions.
A craftsman makes traditional shoes locally called "chappal" at a shop in northwest Pakistan's Peshawar on Sept. 19, 2020. (Photo by Saeed Ahmad/Xinhua)
